repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:testing
MAINTAINER Danijel Kor≈æinek <danijel.korzinek@pja.edu.pl>

RUN apt-get update && \
            apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python3 python3-pip git libavdevice-dev libavfilter-dev libopus-dev libvpx-dev pkg-config && \
            apt-get clean && apt-get autoclean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir aiortc aiohttp numpy

RUN git clone https://github.com/danijel3/KaldiWebrtcServer /server

ENTRYPOINT ["python3","/server/server.py"]
CMD ["--servers","/server/servers.json"]
